channel.title: Api on AstonishingElixirs
channel.description: Recent content in Api on AstonishingElixirs

item.title: Tor Stem API
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: Tor Stem Controller Just in case somebody out there is looking for an example of how to use Tor’s Stem API, here is a tiny Python script that allows the user to monitor circuit connections. Here, I’m just getting basic information like description, nickname, and address, but the API docs show much more information that you can get. Just be mindful that you will need to change the string within the authenticate method.

item.title: An Introduction to the Stylo Library [R]
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: An Introduction to the Stylo Library What is Stylometry? Stylometry uses linguistic style to determine who authored some anonymous piece of writing, and it has diverse applications. The authorship of some suicide notes may be questionable. Most forum users have aliases in an attempt to anonymize themselves. And some authors publish their writings under pseudonyms. In these varying cases, stylometry can be used to deanonymize an author. What is Stylo?
